name: Thinking with Boxes
description:
Do you like moving around boxes? Do you like bolting multiple together to make moving them harder?

No?

Well, that is what this game is all about.

Controls Keyboard

Keyboard input will not work in Internet Explorer or older versions of Edge, use a different browser instead.

  • Left-Arrow, Right-Arrow: Move
  • X: Jump
  • Enter: Restart Level
Gamepad
  • D-Pad: Move
  • A: Jump
  • Start (sometimes called Option): Restart Level
Touch

This is mostly for completeness. Consider not playing with touch input if possible.

  • Hold left or right edge: Move
  • Tap and hold in center: Jump
  • Tap in center top: Restart Level
